```{r setup, include=FALSE}
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
```

```{r lees_route}
infopunt <- readOGR(
  "route/infopunt.geojson", 
  "OGRGeoJSON", 
  verbose = FALSE, 
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  rename(long = coords.x1, lat = coords.x2)
basis <- readOGR(
  "route/route.geojson", 
  "OGRGeoJSON", 
  verbose = FALSE, 
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
segment <- basis@data %>%
  rownames_to_column("id") %>%
  inner_join(
    fortify(basis),
    by = "id"
  ) %>%
  inner_join(
    read_csv("route/route.csv") %>%
      filter(grepl("Wegwijzers", route)) %>%
      mutate(
        vorige = lag(knoop),
        segment = sprintf("%i-%i", pmin(knoop, vorige), pmax(knoop, vorige))
      ) %>%
      filter(!is.na(vorige)),
    by = "segment"
  ) %>%
  mutate(group = interaction(group, route))
aanbevolen <- basis@data %>%
  rownames_to_column("id") %>%
  inner_join(
    fortify(basis),
    by = "id"
  ) %>%
  inner_join(
    read_csv("route/route.csv") %>%
      filter(grepl("Aanbevolen", route)) %>%
      mutate(
        vorige = lag(knoop),
        segment = sprintf("%i-%i", pmin(knoop, vorige), pmax(knoop, vorige))
      ) %>%
      filter(!is.na(vorige)),
    by = "segment"
  ) %>%
  mutate(group = interaction(group, route))
origineel <- basis@data %>%
  rownames_to_column("id") %>%
  inner_join(
    fortify(basis),
    by = "id"
  ) %>%
  inner_join(
    read_csv("route/route.csv") %>%
      filter(grepl("Oorspronkelijk", route)) %>%
      mutate(
        vorige = lag(knoop),
        segment = sprintf("%i-%i", pmin(knoop, vorige), pmax(knoop, vorige))
      ) %>%
      filter(!is.na(vorige)),
    by = "segment"
  ) %>%
  mutate(group = interaction(group, route))
```

```{r lees_openstreetmap}
snelweg <- readOGR("osm/snelweg.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
hoofdweg <- readOGR("osm/hoofdweg.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
lokaleweg <- readOGR("osm/lokale_weg.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
pad <- readOGR("osm/pad.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
waterweg <- readOGR("osm/waterweg.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
spoorweg <- readOGR("osm/spoorweg.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
fietsknooppunt_route <- readOGR("osm/fietsknooppunt.osm", "lines", verbose = FALSE)
fietsknooppunt <- readOGR("osm/fietsknooppunt.osm", "points", verbose = FALSE)
park <- readOGR("osm/park.osm", "multipolygons", verbose = FALSE)
gras <- readOGR("osm/gras.osm", "multipolygons", verbose = FALSE)
water <- readOGR("osm/water.osm", "multipolygons", verbose = FALSE)
```

```{r omzetten_naar_dataframe}
snelweg.f <- fortify(snelweg)
hoofdweg.f <- fortify(hoofdweg)
lokaleweg.f <- fortify(lokaleweg)
pad.f <- fortify(pad)
waterweg.f <- fortify(waterweg)
spoorweg.f <- fortify(spoorweg)
fietsknooppunt.f <- as.data.frame(fietsknooppunt) %>%
  filter(grepl("rcn_ref", other_tags)) %>%
  mutate(knooppunt = gsub(".*\"([[:digit:]]*)\"", "\\1", other_tags)) %>%
  group_by(knooppunt) %>%
  summarise(
    long = mean(coords.x1),
    lat = mean(coords.x2)
  )
park.f <- fortify(park)
gras.f <- fortify(gras)
water.f <- fortify(water)
```

<a href="kaarten_files/figure-html/folder-1.pdf">
```{r folder, fig.cap = "Kaart uit de folder"}
ggplot(segment, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group)) +
  geom_polygon(data = water, fill = "#addeff") +
  geom_polygon(data = gras, fill = "#bcde93") +
  geom_polygon(data = park, fill = "#aed1a0") +
  geom_path(data = fietsknooppunt_route, colour = "#e9c1ff", size = 5 * mm) +
  geom_path(data = waterweg.f, colour = "#abdbfb", size = 0.75 * mm) +
  geom_path(data = spoorweg.f, colour = "black", size = 0.75 * mm, linetype = "55") +
  geom_path(data = snelweg.f, colour = "#c8d8c8", size = 3.5 * mm) +
  geom_path(data = hoofdweg.f, colour = "#f1e4e4", size = 3 * mm) +
  geom_path(data = lokaleweg.f, colour = "grey75", size = 1 * mm) +
  geom_path(data = pad.f, colour = "grey75", size = 1 * mm, linetype = "33") +
  geom_path(aes(linetype = route), size = 2.5 * mm, show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_label(
    data = fietsknooppunt.f, 
    aes(label = knooppunt), 
    group = NA, 
    colour = "darkgreen",
    size = 6 * mm,
    label.padding = unit(1, "mm"),
    label.r = unit(2, "mm")
  ) +
  geom_label(
    data = infopunt, 
    aes(label = id), 
    group = NA, 
    colour = "red",
    size = 8 * mm,
    label.padding = unit(1, "mm"),
    label.r = unit(2, "mm")
  ) +
  coord_map(xlim = c(4.195542, 4.268620), ylim = c(50.69780, 50.76322))
```
</a>
